bibl.title: Fontes Historiae Nubiorum. Textual Sources for the History of the Middle Nile Region between the Eighth Century BC and the Sixth Century AD. Vol. II: From the Mid-Fifth to the First Century BC.
bibl.seg: EIDE Tormod, Tomas HÄGG, Richard Holton PIERCE and László TÖRÖK, Fontes Historiae Nubiorum. Textual Sources for the History of the Middle Nile Region between the Eighth Century BC and the Sixth Century AD. Vol. II: From the Mid-Fifth to the First Century BC.
C.R. par Herman De Meulenaere, ChrEg 74 (1999) No. 147, pp. 89-90 [concerne aussi: vol. I, 1994]. - Lana Troy, Acta Orientalia 60 (1999) pp. 213-220.
